Pintmaster

Lee Wilkins & my Xbox

I bought my Xbox from a guy named Lee Wilkins who introduced me to all these Social Networking websites as well as Wordpress. Got my Xbox modded and have been using it mainly to watch TV shows that I used to have to watch either on the computer or by hooking up my Powerbook - it was well worth the $200 investment for the Xbox and the modding and I would highly recommend that to anyone else. Check out Xbox Scene for more info. I got a guy called cYon to do the installation for me.
